name: Core2 Tetris - First Ever!
description: The FIRST Tetris game for M5Stack Core2! Revolutionary boundary-based touch controls: TAP inside game field to rotate, HOLD for soft drop. Touch outside edges to move. Features 20% wider gameplay, thick colorful borders, hold piece functionality, hard drop, and intuitive gesture controls. Perfected through extensive testing for the ultimate mobile tetris experience.
author: CoreyMillia
